website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, unscented sunscreen that you can feel good about putting on your face.
pros: A great light coverage option for those who don't wear makeup
cons: Some have said it dries out their skin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but what's with the $15 price hike???
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I've been able to use on my face without breaking out. It's magic and amazing. I absolutely love it and recommend it to anyone. I came back to re-order, but to my surprise they hiked up the price by $15! I originally paid $21 for this the first time around, that's quite a drastic price increase. I'll try to look elsewhere to purchase this from.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Magic potion!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know all the technical beauty terms so here's my best description-it feels like nothing is on my face. It immediately is absorbed or just smooths into my skin, no oily or chalky feeling. I tried it alone one day but my skin felt too dry so I still put my moisturizer under it. Somehow it makes my skin look so much better and yet no one would know I have anything on...magic I'm telling ya!
customer_reviews.author: megs

customer_reviews.title: Feels Ahhh-mazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing sunscreen for face that I have ever used. It is not at all greasy and goes on like a cloud. It doesn't add a lot of color but smooths complexion and minimizes pores. Although I have always worn a good amount of makeup I don't feel like I need to with this. Just smooth this on with a dot of blush (concealer for under eye area is a must for me), an optional light dust of powder and mascara. That's it for a fresh summer look. Highly recommens.
customer_reviews.author: TexasKelt

customer_reviews.title: Texture is different :(
customer_reviews.text: Normally get through Birchbox and love it - velvety and whipped texture. This one is all runny and oily, def not what I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love this daily sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is the best. I have very sensitive skin and most chemical sunscreens cause me to break out. I love that I can use this daily sunscreen without any breakout issues. I love that it's truly unscented and the smooth whipped texture is silky and rubs in very easily. The coverage is very sheer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love This Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunscreen a few days ago and so far I love it. I wear it under my Juice beauty foundation and it keeps me shine free. It goes on silky smooth and blends well. Not sure why other reviewers said it made their faces white. I was concerned about buying it on Amazon because I was afraid of getting a fake product. I contacted COOLA and they informed me Top Shelf Brands was an authorized dealer. So for those wondering you are getting the real thing. Anyway, I would definitely repurchase if it continues to go well.
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: They changed my FAVORITE sunscreen :-(
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sunscreen for the past 5 years & it was my absolute favorite product. No white cast, moisturizing yet gave me a nice matte finish (I have combo skin). I purchased a new bottle & they changed the formula!! My face looks like a grease slick. It is not mattifying and does not cover as well as the last one. I am soooooo sad. Now I must find a new daily BB cream
customer_reviews.author: Interplanet Janet

customer_reviews.title: Super watery
customer_reviews.text: It is super watery and goes on shiny. Not at all like the amazing product I sampled. So disappointed. Pictures taken after shaking vigorously hoping it just needed to be mixed. Before shaking it came out almost completely liquid.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscreen around!
customer_reviews.text: Being an Esthetician, I'm always on the lookout for outstanding, quality, cruelty free and Vegan products. Sunscreen is a tough one to find, but not anymore, thanks to Coola! Absolutely love their products. I tend to have more sensitive, reactive and oily skin. Coola is the best for me. It does not clog my pores, provides great protection (you must reapply if being out all day in the sun; as with any sunscreen though), and this particular one is also great as a primer or left alone. Spreads like butter, but with no greasy or white residue left behind! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: tinytank

customer_reviews.title: Not good for men, especially those with facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and read glowing reviews and how it wouldn't tint your skin, well that's not true, especially around facial hair. What was even worse is the feel of it on my skin. Almost like I put WD40 on it minus the greasy feeling. It was so slippery. To add to the pain, I had to wash my face 3 times to get it all off - it kept clinging to my skin. I know some people love this product, but it's definitely not for me or probably any guy especially those with facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: V011

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but could have more tint
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try some products from COOLA and finally pulled the trigger with the high-ish price point. The texture of the lotion feels really nice on my face, very light and not greasy at all. I have also worn to the beach and in the sun for extended periods, and the sun protection seems to be good. My only complaint is that the tint is very minimal, I was hoping to use this as a replacement for other BB creams, but it does not have the coverage to really cover the natural redness in my face. Overall, great for days when you really aren't wanting to wear make-up, I just wish it was slightly more tinted.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Goes bad fast
customer_reviews.text: The first day I tried it I didn’t like it much. It has no coverage to it and it was not super matte and did not keep my face matte. After a week or two I went to try it out again. The formula had separated and was so greasy. I mixed it up a bunch which improved it but it was not as solid as it was that first day. I went to put it on my face and it just beaded up and didn’t work at all. It felt gross and I had to wash my face again. A complete waste of money since it separated so fast and I cannot get it back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Fulgencio

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen caused horribly painful acne breakout on face, throat, and neck. Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst sunscreen I've ever used! It felt great when I put it on... But I broke out with the most painful pimples... Not only on my face, but also on my throat and neck area. I'm in my late 30's, that's not supposed to happen! This product was the only thing I had changed in my skincare routine... I wasted $32+tax to have my vacation pretty much ruined by a horribly painful acne breakout! I never use this product on my body nor will I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenlpio

customer_reviews.title: Huge letdown
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but unfortunately, I hated it from the moment I put it on. It felt very slick and oily, a problem I have with silicone based products such as many primers. It does eventually set into a matte finish but for my combo/oily skin, it set very strange and patchy despite trying to work it in.
customer_reviews.author: Roya F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, feels great going on, could use more coverage for a "tinted" moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this product as a sample from Birchbox and decided to get the full size. It is a lot cheaper here on Amazon than on the Birchbox site. Although they're the same product, it seemed like the Birchbox one offered more coverage. I would like more coverage (minus one star for the limited coverage) but otherwise this is a great product that can be used on its own or as a primer. The matte feel is particularly good in the summer when my skin tends to get oilier.
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSomethingToSay

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting color
customer_reviews.text: Why would Coola tint their mineral sunscreen puke yellow tan? Actually the color is almost exactly the color of breast fed infant poop. The texture is nice even though the ingredients have changed from the non-tinted version. I am hoping that the color is light enough to not show as I certainly don't want any additional yellow on my face. I took off an additional star overall because Coola never replied to my inquiry about the availability of the non-tinted version.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  D

customer_reviews.title: How have I lived without this??
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing sunscreen!! I am a red head and have had numerous issues with trying to find a daily sunscreen for my face that won't irritate it, smell weird, sting my eyes if it gets in them, and be good under make up. This does ALL of that and also spreads on like a dream! It acts also as BB cream and has a beige tint to it so I have not even needed any face make up besides this all summer. I will definitely be buying more and using this consistently. No scent at all, not even aware that it's on my face, except that I am burn free! Favorite new make up bag product ever!!
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: I like the coverage and it smells very good
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive for the amount you get, but I am one who does not buy cosmetics in department stores, price is subjective. I like the coverage and it smells very good. It feels very smooth and moisturizing while you put it on, but it does linger in wrinkles and make that dry wrinkle look happen (that and the price are what knock it down to three stars). It is better than putting on white all-mineral sunscreen - at least it does not turn my face white. I got it in order to avoid putting on more mainstream (toxic) powder or foundation, but I still have not found what I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Karmalita

customer_reviews.title: Super watery & leaves an oily residue. Definitely not matte.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve LOVED this BB for years, but they seem to have changed the formula and it’s really watery and slick now. So sad. It was my go-to for so long.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice
customer_reviews.text: It goes on like butter and feels really good as I rub it in. It's not very tinted so it doesn't put any color on my face but it's also not white so it doesn't make my face pasty which I appreciate. Even my husband will wear it when he sees me putting it on. It doesn't clog pores and cause breakouts like most face sunscreens I've used. I live in Colorado where the air is very dry, so this doesn't work great as a moisturizer alone (I have to wear face lotion beneath this). I love the Coola brand and appreciate that this mineral sunscreen doesn't have any of the cancer-causing ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Short version--I didn't like this, but you might
customer_reviews.text: Short version--I didn't like this, but you might. I don't wear makeup & I keep hunting for a sunscreen that looks basically like my skin with moisturizer. To me, this product was more like a very light foundation than a sunscreen. It's more opaque even than other tinted moisturizers I've tried. It wasn't shiny & there was no white cast, but it made my face dull, uniform, & plastic-looking. But again, this is the perspective of someone who hates foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry/ combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Great formula for very oily skin but dear god, do not use if you're the least bit dry. I have combination skin & tried this in the winter which was a huge mistake- it made every tiny flake of dry skin stand out so much that I had to wash it off. This was even after using a thick moisturizer underneath. I'm going to save it for the summer months when I'm a grease ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Greasy fluid dripping all over
customer_reviews.text: Dripping of greasy liquid keeps coming out of the tube. The suncreen itself is absorbing well if there is no grease. However texture is not consistent because of the dripping oil. The tint is not so effective either on my face. For $36, i expected way more than that. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I love the matte finish of this sunscreen! A lot of sunscreens leave your face shiny and gross looking. You could use it instead of your foundation too. It doesn't cover like a foundation but it does offer some blurring properties. The only reason I can't give this 5 stars is because it doesn't sink into my skin if I am wearing a moisturizer. I usually put on a thin layer of an acne treatment and then follow with a moisturizer. I tried to put it on after these products but it just clumps and kind of rolls off my skin. I wish I could wear it with my other skin care products.
customer_reviews.author: digs

customer_reviews.title: Never stop making this please
customer_reviews.text: I have found my favorite face product at long last. It truly is matte like it says. I use this everyday after washing my face and applying any other creams or serums. It adds just enough coverage to smooth my complexion without looking like I’ve got the old “pancake” makeup on. It’s got the spf that everyone should be wearing and it doesn’t make you look shiny or greasy. I tried a more expensive brand, but went back to this. Make sure you shake well first. I hope I can always find it!
customer_reviews.author: welshgirl

customer_reviews.title: Mineral FACE sunscreen,worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this COOLA for several years. I love it because it is made in a MINERAL style, so when you put it on your face, it glides beautifully. I always buy the "MATT-TINT" style because it does have a hint of color,which matches my skin perfectly. (I have light olive skin color on my face). You do not have to use a lot of this sunscreen on your face, just a small dallop. Since I only use this on my face,one tube lasts me the entire Summer. It is not cheap but it is Organic and worth the price, (in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Great daily use sunscreen, feels lightweight on skin!
customer_reviews.text: Wear this now instead of foundation. Reached an age where foundation settles into everything and looks awful. This is a lightweight feel sunscreen and goes on smoothly with a matte finish. Great for daily use. I've tried a few other mineral tinted sunscreens (la roche and Australian gold) but this has a much better texture (and the tint in those is too much for my skin tone)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and dreamy
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product in Birchbox, and then purchased on Amazon for the best price. I love this product. It was great in the summer and when traveling when I wanted to be protected from the sun and have a little coverage without having to put on any more product. The feeling of the liquid when it glides on is actually like feathers. It is very hard to describe, but it felt like I was doing my skin a favor. The color is practically sheer, which is what I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: product not safety sealed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come safety sealed so assume someone had already opened it. When I took it out of the box, there was oil all around the lid and inside the cap. It was very runny/oily looking. I wiped it on my hand and the sunscreen does appear to go on nicely but because it wasn't sealed, I didn't want to use it. Very disappointed as this isn't cheap! And sadly I didn't open it until I got to the lake. I ordered it a month ago and didn't even look at it until I was out of town. Not happy....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I recently received a sample in my Birch Box subscription and loved it for the summer! I was excited to find a Prime Day deal so I jumped on it because the regular price is $36. It's extremely light weight, almost like a whipped lotion so you don't feel greasy at all in the heat. I use this instead of foundation if I'm outdoors in the heat so I also get sunscreen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started using this, but right out of the gates I really liked it. The texture is like mousse, it feels so nice. I wouldn’t say it makes your skin look completely matte, but I have oily skin and it did reduce much of the shine. I don’t wear foundation or anything and this is the only sunblock product that I have ever used that didn’t make my skin look oily. The tint isn’t dramatic, I have pretty light skin and it works perfectly. I will be buying more in the future as well as trying their other products!
customer_reviews.author: clarrissa

customer_reviews.title: Best facial sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face sunscreen I have ever used! It looks expensive, but I am still using the first tube which is now over two months. I use it daily over top of a moisturizer. I don't use a foundation make-up anymore, just this. The tint in the sunscreen evens out my facial skin tones, so no need for the added make-up. The sunscreen goes on smoothly, and looks very natural, too. Love it! Now I order it through subscribe and save on Amazon, which saves on the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Separates
customer_reviews.text: I’m so torn on this. I really like the feel of the product and the SPF. But - and there are two major buts 1) it separates and no matter the amount of shaking it still comes out watery often times and 2) I need a moisturizer under it or it sits in the dry patches. To repurchase or not????? Based on the separation issue I’m going with not.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs into skin leaving a matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Regardless of the heat, this stuff stays put. My job is sweaty (yoga) and I usually start sweating from my head/face. All other products I’ve tried caused my face to sweat faster and wipe away all the protection with it. This product immediately absorbs into my skin like a dry oil creating a matte like finish. It does not sting my eyes. The product size is convenient. I carry it in my purse and apply throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: TOO EXPENSIVE FOR SUNSCREEN
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before and it was nice that it can be applied smoothly and does gives a matte finish. However, the second time around, it's so damn expensive, 36 dollars for sunscreen?! And they choose snail mail to save a few bucks. I still have not received this item...kinda disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: Island girl ~ Chamex

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for sunscreen that leaves my skin matte and not greasy and this worked like a charm. And it leaves my skin feeling really soft. I can skip primer and it'd be ok. It doesn't have any scent which I like because I'm pretty sensitive. And just as important that this is a mineral sunscreen and not chemical so it's reef safe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Mattifying
customer_reviews.text: I first got this as part of a Birchbox subscription gift someone had sent me. I recently found that sample in a drawer and wondered why I never used it. Well, I fell in love - I am still finding the sweet spot of when to apply, i.e. I use my daily moisturizer then put this on and still use primer under my powder foundation. That seems like a bit much to me so I'm trying to figure out which step I can cut out. I do really like the finish this leaves whether alone or under makeup. It's also a better prize on Amazon than you'll find at Sephora or anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Won't cause breakouts but doesn't play nice under makeup
customer_reviews.text: I used this under makeup when I first started running about a year ago. I wanted something that would protect my skin and blur out the redness. It doesn't exactly provide any coverage so I found I needed to use a bit of concealer. I found the texture to have a slip to it and therefore any makeup I applied on top would cake up and sort of bunch around my jaw and nose areas. I guess it's alright on it's own, but I really am looking for something I can wear under a bit of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: CaCatGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my skin, but I wouldn't call this a bb cream, more of a primer and spf protection. The cream itself if tinted beige, but has 0% coverage and doesn't cover any type of uneven skin tone. Product is too dry to use alone, I still use a lightweight moisterizer underneath and cover any blemishes with concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki G

customer_reviews.title: Silky - and matte - but doesnt dry out the skin.... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: feels fabulous! Im a bit on the oily side - especially in the sunny hot time of the year. this goes on soft as silk and nice and matte - but doesnt cause my skin to feel and look dry as many mattifying products do. I use this as a primer and use a creamy foundation with SPF over it. Then I head out to all weekend long sunny sweaty baseball tournaments and my makeup actually stays in place all day! LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Mayo

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product... it is lightweight and feels like silk on my skin. The tint is a bit lighter than I thought, but it works well with my medium beige complexion. If my sensitive skin continues to love this sunscreen, I will use it forever! Of course, I will update this review if my skin doesn't continue to tolerate it...
customer_reviews.author: MnD

customer_reviews.title: The BB is better for darker skin. So natural!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I ever get the cucumber version of this SPF? The tint in this formula blends well with my light skin (I'm black--think a bit lighter than Beyonce/ a wear "golden tan" in bareminerals) and really does "porefect" and minimize. It's working out as a great base for my blush and I look forward to using it with my mineral powder foundation. I bet I won't have to use as much. I do use a combination of Mario Badescu's rose water face spray and a tiny squirt of Aura Cacia's rosehip oil before apploying the Coola BB cream. My skin's drying out as I age, but still no wrinkles at 36. My secret---sunscreen every, single, day.
customer_reviews.author: Tahanage

customer_reviews.title: Matte
customer_reviews.text: Love this matte sun screen. I put it under makeup and it has become a must have for my daily routine. You can feel the matte texture when you apply it. Make sure to shake up good before use or it could be watery. When I apply it doesnt have any color even tho it is tinted. Yay for no white cast.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I tried Coola Mineral Suncare Tint first as a sample and fell in love with how light it is and how smoothly it goes on. Plus, it's not heavy, sticky or oily, and small amount goes a long way. It's unscented, which I love, and it is gentle to my sensitive skin. If you're looking for a very lightly tinted moisturizing product with SPF 30 for your face, I highly recommend this product. However, if you want something more heavily tinted that will cover blemishes or dark spots, this will not serve that purpose alone; you could easily apply a foundation product over it.
customer_reviews.author: abcsquared

customer_reviews.title: Product separates. Must “shake well” before use.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how the product separates. Needs to be “shaken” before squeezing out of the tube. I would not but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Not tinted...
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it. It makes my face feel really good and soft...the product is oily at times. I really have to shake it up. Also, I don't really see a tint so I can't use it as a replacement for foundation as I planned. I love that it is SPF 30, because I am in my 50's and really need to use a sunscreen daily at this point. I would have given it 5 stars if it was really tinted.
customer_reviews.author: Coco j

customer_reviews.title: Try it one time and I think you will be a satisfied user
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. Have used multiple brands of sun screen in the past. They either were too greasy on my face or managed, as hard as I tried, to keep them away from my eyes but somehow ended up there anyway. I am 75 years old and try very hard to keep my face covered. Trying to avoid the collection of brown spots on my face. The only complaint I have is each time you apply it, remember to shake the tube well before you apply.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Taylor KNindNole Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Applies with a matte finish and smooths area great for makeup prep. The only complaint: It could use a little high SPF. I live in the desert and would love to see it in a 50 SPF, but I'm not sure if that would affect the perfect texture of it. I use this EVERY day and buy it by the twos!
customer_reviews.author: VegasRunaway

customer_reviews.title: Poor coverage alone, but great under makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a natural BB cream. Unfortunately this one offers ZERO coverage so I was disappointed. However, it does go on super smoothly and makes it much easier to apply my non-toxic foundation stick which has the propensity to be on the thicker side. While I was looking for a stand alone product, this still has some really nice features. I also like that there is no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, clogs pores
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smooth as silk and feels like nothing is on your face. Easy to use makeup on top of it. Sun protection is good. Still need to reapply if you’re in the sun all day. My only complaint is that my pores seem more clogged after continual use of this
customer_reviews.author: SD Heatherly

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Finally found a good matte sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: After like 3 years of searching for a really good matte sunscreen I think I finally found an amazing one that’s actually matte!! Other matte sunscreens haven’t really worked for me, they still make me shiny or just make my skin look bad overall. This one is actually matte and feels velvety like a primer. No white cast! Way easier to reapply since it does not feel greasy. I would recommend this and will be repurchasing :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mineral sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: To say this is a good mineral sunscreen is an understatement. This formula goes on so smoothly and so easily. It does not clog my pores, like other suncreen brands. There is a very slight tint to it, and dries nicely with a matte finish. My favorite mineral suncreen!
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Soothing for rosacea. Like rubbing velvet on my face!
customer_reviews.text: I am fair-complexioned with much red from rosacea. I use the unscented matte tint and it is a very light coverage, perfect for most days. Sometimes I use a foundation on top if I am doing more makeup. This sunscreen just feels so good on my skin. It is expensive and hope the price does not increase. But, for right now, I will afford it. I live in Hawaii and need sunscreen year round.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaMaui

customer_reviews.title: Loyal fan for years
customer_reviews.text: Use Coola daily as a matte sunscreen (unscented). It’s not greasy, but light and easy to blend in. I have very oily skin and it doesn’t pool or melt since it’s such a light tint and product. Though I wear a powder foundation over it during the winter, often in the summer I find it’s just enough to even out my redness and I don’t need anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: An invisible shield
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! It's Non-greasy and fragrance-free. Goes on so smoothly it's almost like putting whipped cream on my face. Works really well. I played tennis for 2 hours in the heat and humidity of coastal North Carolina with out a trace a burn. Plus it didn't drip down my face and sting my eyes like my previous sunscreens
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a face product with SPF that does not make me break out in hives. I have tried so many other brands that claim to be hypoallergenic SPF products, and all have resulted in hives on my face. This is the first one where I have no negative reaction at all. I am so happy I can now have some sun protection. Use this daily and will continue for as long as they carry the product!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Scully

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product yet....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this product. Recommended by my dermatologist as I wanted a sunscreen w/ (benign) zinc oxide. Coola goes on well, not greasy, has a sl tint. Problem is doesn’t work as well as regular Neutrogena sunscreen. May not reorder especially due to price and less effective coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection but you still get color
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have bought it several times. The tint is great - not too light or too dark, goes on smooth for a matte primer under my foundation. It’s not enough coverage to use alone because of my skin pigmentation, so I wear foundation too. I like that it protects my skin, yet I can still get some color.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Gets watery so easily
customer_reviews.text: Gets runny and watery :/ not so much protection. Wondering if the ingredients changed
customer_reviews.author: Tsatsral

customer_reviews.title: We are always on the look out for good sunscreens. I have to admit this was an ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in a Dermatology office in Southern California for the last 26 years, managing it for 20 of those. We are always on the look out for good sunscreens. I have to admit this was an impulse buy after seeing the 2 active ingredients, Titanium Dioxide and Zinc Oxide. I would, and have recommended this product to patients.. Great spreadability, with a slight tint to it and I use it daily. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dpa

customer_reviews.title: Feels light & works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer & sunscreen! It works great & feels light. I was worried after seeing the reviews that it comes out oily eventually. I could tell that it started to separate, and it did come out looking more “oily” but it does go on feeling oily at all. It still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Elle O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's pretty expensive but worth it in my opinion. Seamless transition from my old sunscreen. Normally if I switch to a new product my skin gets a little fussy and breaks out. Didn't have any issues with this sunscreen and it's smoothed my skin out. Highly recommend if it's in your budget.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sunscreen For Sensitive Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how much I love this product! As an aging hippie (68), I've never worn makeup. Now, I find that the only sunscreen I've found that doesn't upset my sensitive skin also evens my blotchy skin tone. Wish I'd​ had this forty years ago! Kept my face from getting sunburned on a trip to Florida as well as my day-to-day life on the St. Lawrence river.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jo

customer_reviews.title: I use the un-tinted every day and love it - the sunscreen melts into my skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the un-tinted every day and love it - the sunscreen melts into my skin and provides good protection from sunburn. The tinted has a strange feel on both my fingers and face. It does not smooth into the skin completely and sometimes has a "make-up" look, emphasizing my pores. It does seem to protect from sunburn when I wear it, but I prefer the feel of the un-tinted version.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Why am I just now finding this stuff?
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have searched and searched for product with sunscreen that won't irritate my face. I have bottles and bottles of bb cream, cc cream, and face lotions with SPF, all of which irritate my skin and around my eyes. So, I just didn't wear sunscreen---GASP! and I live in Florida--GASP-GASP! I was hesitant because of the tint, I do not wear foundation, but it's so slight, I hardly noticed. I loved the matte finish. I'm so happy I finally found something that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: so light. I wore it for lunch and everyone was asking me what i had on my face, it almost feels like you have no makeup. It also has SPF which is great. I have recommended this to all my friends and will continue to tell more people about this.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Separates into an oily mess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product once at a spa and liked it so much that I ordered it on Amazon. The initial two tubes were perfect. Not oily and gave a nice sheen to my skin. I then ordered a second time on Amazon and the product was disgusting. Chunky and oily and all separated. I thought it might have just been a bad batch and reordered. Again, it arrived all oily and chunky. It is a shame as I originally really liked this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yuval Reisner

customer_reviews.title: the best spf
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff it’s amazing goes on like silk i’ve been using sample sizes out of my birch box and always went through it quickly, i was worried buying it off amazon but it’s the same product i can’t say how much i love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Wash it off every night!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I loved this sunblock (easy to apply, safe) however over months and months of time came to realize that it WAS the reason our 4 1/2 year old daughters chin and nose we horribly clogged. She broke out into a rash on her chin coupled with whiteheads over her nose for over 3 months! Crazy but our dermatology confirmed this sunblock caused it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie88

customer_reviews.title: Effective sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Second summer using this product. (Also all winter). It's like a tinted moisturizer, very light coverage. But i have used it all day outside with no other sun protection and did not get sunburned. Does burn like heck if you get it in your eye.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this sunscreen. I had used another Coola sunscreen and it was a bit greasy, but it wasn't brilliantly white either. For this, I wanted something for my face that I could wear everyday that didn't feel greasy. This is like wearing powder! It gives my skin the smoothest finish! LOVE IT! If I want a more polished look, I wear foundation over it and it looks fantastic. I never thought that sunscreen would be so beneficial in ways beyond sun protection! It would get 5 stars EXCEPT that it's rated 3 on the Environmental Working Group's Skin Deep website. I'd really prefer if that were lower.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaP

customer_reviews.title: I am buying this again.
customer_reviews.text: It goes on sooo smooth! I love this stuff. The tint may not work as well as you would like but it gets the job done. It feels like a primer more than a bb cream it goes on so smooth. Works perfectly under my other makeup. Even helps make application easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie10112

customer_reviews.title: Will use up. Won't repurchase
customer_reviews.text: This is really creamy and I worry it is not giving me sufficient spf coverage. I was hoping for a sunscreen that would not dry out on my skin and this accomplishes that, but it feels like I can't put on too much since it's so rich. FYI, I am 50, female, normal to dry skin. If this was a 50 spf I would be happier.
customer_reviews.author: EI

customer_reviews.title: ALUMINUM IS THE #1 INGREDIENT - ARE YOU KIDDING ME?
customer_reviews.text: If you don't care about rubbing aluminum on your face this product is for you. Every other aspect of the product is stellar. Look, feel, lightweight, protection, ease of application are top notch but I refuse to apply aluminum on my skin. Seriously if it was aluminum free I would rate it 5 stars with a 5 bonus stars.
customer_reviews.author: KFrog

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.text: It feels kind of slimy when you first put it on but by the time I finish in the bathroom and head to where I apply my makeup and fix my hair, it has soaked in completely. I use a concealer to hide any blemishes and top it all off with a mineral powder. It makes my face appear brighter, which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy and gives decent coverage
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this, as most tinted moisturizers or sunscreens don't give enough coverage. And while it's true that the coverage is still not like wearing my regular foundation, for weekends, this product is perfect. I like the non-greasy consistency (give it a few minutes to soak into your face). Definitely will re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Buonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and not shiny
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected so for. I like that it didn’t make my face shiny and there was just a bit of color in it to cover a few small blemishes. It went on very smoothly. The only thing I wasn’t too keen on is the smell. I found it to be metallic but it dissipated after a few minutes or maybe I got used to it enough to not notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: I love this tinted facial sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted facial sunscreen. It works perfectly with my combination skin (oily through the t-zone dry on cheeks and forehead) When applying it will feel oily but when you look at your face in the mirror, it is matte! I will never be without this for my face. I use it every day and on the days I wear full make-up I use it as a primer under my concealer and powder. I also think it has helped lessen the redness I have in spots on my forehead and cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: TNBAGGAL

customer_reviews.title: or too dark for the super fair, but it's pretty sheer coverage and mixing ...
customer_reviews.text: It is matte without being dry. It has the consistency of mousse and goes on smoothly. I've been using it over my moisturizer, and set it with translucent powder. I'm a light/medium skin tone and this works well for me. I can see where it might be too light for darker complexions, or too dark for the super fair, but it's pretty sheer coverage and mixing some tint or concealer to it should correct that. If you don't like looking shiny or have oily skin, this should work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jonni Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Goes on pretty sheer. Not drying at all
customer_reviews.text: Goes on pretty sheer. Not drying at all, my face actually feels very silky with this on. I apply mineral veil on top which gives the appearance of a slightly more made up look, as well as provides more sun protection. I wore the un-tinted version to Costa Rica and didn't get a bit of sun on my face, even though I didn't reapply it all day. I love Coola products!
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: Tinted!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as it gives me sun protection without the usual chemicals of other sunscreens. Because this is tinted, it eliminates the "white" look of other zinc products. It's tint makes it look like it's not even there. I also like that this one is unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Coquinas

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen that makes my skin look better!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really loving this B.B./Sunscreen. It actually makes my skin look better once I put it on. Even though it is lightly tinted it blends in quickly to my fair skin tone. It doesn’t feel greasy and hasn’t given my acne prone skin any ance. Also, it shrinks my pore size. I am definitely going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: It has velvet like texture that makes my acne scarred skin smoother instantly
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more starts I would. This is more than a sunscreen. It has velvet like texture that makes my acne scarred skin smoother instantly. Most days I only use this sunscreen when I go out. It fills some of my acne scars and covers the redness on my face. It does not irritate my sensitive skin at all. When I do make up, this sunscreen makes my foundation glide and spread better. I have pale skin, so its color matches to my skin tone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mirasmama

customer_reviews.title: Great and totally matte
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my face. It’s totally matte. Feels like silk going on. No issues with causing breakouts. My face is very sensitive so I’m happy I found a great face sunblock.
customer_reviews.author: L N L Owl

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheer coverage
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very problematic including patches of eczema. When I have flareups I tend to not use any creams or lotions on my skin as they aggravate the eczema. This did Not and it is wonderful to finally find a sunscreen that works with my sensitive delicate skin. The fact that it is not "white" is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline aka Granny Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: I HATE sunscreen. It either irritates my skin or makes it feel super greasy. This does neither. Feels good going on, not greasy. No irritation. For the first time ever I’m wearing sunscreen everyday. The tint is just enough to feel like it evens out my skin tone a little. I’m quite fair, though, so not sure what it would look like in darker skin. Overall will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mirim M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't notice any difference
customer_reviews.text: The texture is weird. Since it is a small bottle (and not that cheap) I don't really want to empty the tube in 2 days but it disappears on the skin so quickly that I am never sure if I put it on everywhere. I was looking for a BB cream with natural ingredients and a spf. However I cannot see ANY difference before and after i put it not.
customer_reviews.author: namdam

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Love how this goes on with a matte finish to avoid attracting dirt. I wish they didnt use so much dimethicone but it does give the texture a silky feel and stay on when swimming for a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: A discerning customer

customer_reviews.title: Luscious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face sunscreen because It gives me the most natural little bit of cover along with with protection of a good sunscreen. It's light and luscious. I love that it doesn't hurt the environment or me.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal fan of Coola for several years. I love the smooth feel when applying the sunscreen. I never get burned. Or even slightly red.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Love this spf!
customer_reviews.text: Love this matte spf!! Sunscreen always make me break out but this brand does not. It goes on matte and has a light tint. It doesn't look like makeup is on but it does make your skin look great. I have very fair skin and I do not get sunburns when I wear this on my face! Pricey but I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: U.Lysses

customer_reviews.title: Love it, would be 5 stars but can feel slightly chalky
customer_reviews.text: For starters this product definitely does everything everyone raves about. It is an excellent light coverage on my skin (which goes between fair and medium depending on how recently I self-tanned) and blends in seemlessly. It seems to soak in well an dI've never had problems with it running if I workout after applying. The reason for the 1 star reduction is that I think it feels a bit chalky, almost like there is flour in it. This does not seem to effect the appearance, and the feeling fades from my face after about half an hour, so it's not the end of the world, it's just not my favorite feeling.
customer_reviews.author: JenM

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients - note enough protection!
customer_reviews.text: The texture is nice and good under makeup, but read the ingredients! I was very surprised that there is so little actual protection!!! Only Titanium Dioxide 3.2%, and Zinc Oxide 1.8%. From what I understand that's not nearly enough. I'm switching to one with much higher Zinc Oxide percentage. I don't want to mess around with skin protection.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone! Perfect alone or under make-up.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day under make-up or alone for a mineral based sunscreen and primer. I have very fair skin and I am always seeking sun protection. Goes on beautifully and helps protect against sun damage, and works great as a primer. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s very creamy but it’s matte. My face doesn’t feel oily at all throughout the day. I will definitely try their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Samnang J.

customer_reviews.title: Pills right off your face leaving you looking like you’re molting
customer_reviews.text: Feels gummy like a primer, not what I want in a sunscreen. It applies fine leaving your face matte and like velvet, but within an hour it pulls at the smallest touch. It looks like my skin is shedding. I’ve tried with my usual products (lotions and serums) and again with nothing on before and it still pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No coverage, not moisturizing 😔
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this product, but it did not deliver on its promises for me. No coverage at all, not like other B.B. creams and not moisturizing at all. I had to reapply my daily moisturizer mixed with a bit of foundation..how i usually make my own B.B. cream, but was trying to replace that step with this product, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is amazing. It feels wonderful on, and just sort of perfects your skin tone without adding color. I love the matte finish for the summer, and the sun protection is great. Doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, either!
customer_reviews.author: Lady La

customer_reviews.title: Good for you & works, too!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get any better than this for a one-stop wonder that is low on chemicals and high on protection. The matte tint is light to medium and disappears on my light olive-toned face (not sure how well it would work for darker skinned or very pale individuals). It leaves a silky matte finish without looking dull or harsh and provides SPF 30 protection. I put it on every day alone, and for heavier makeup occasions, use it as the silky base for foundation and/or powder. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after trying a sample and liking it. I was very underwhelmed after getting a full bottle. For some reason, it doesn’t blend into my skin at all (+/- moisturizer, etc) and looks uneven. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EJV

product_meta.title: COOLA Mineral Face Matte Tint Sunscreen, SPF 30, Reef-Safe, Unscented 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Give your skin an immediate line-smoothing matte finish and fight signs of aging caused by the sun with this antioxidant-infused farm to face sourced broad spectrum spf 30 mineral sunscreen. This unscented and lightly tinted formula is made with natural rose hip oil which is rich in free radical fighting vitamin c. Naturally calming evening primrose and flax seed oils deliver abundant omega-3 and gamma-linoleic acid to improve elasticity and help skin retain moisture. Natural shea butter smoothes and hydrates while the phyto-protector plankton extract rejuvenates skin. Formulated for all skin types and tones, including those that are especially sensitive or oily. Ingredients - aluminum hydroxide, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), cucumis sativus (cucumber) fruit extract, cyclopentasiloxane, dimethicone crosspolymer, glycerin, hydrogen dimethicone, iron oxides, isopropyl myristate, isopropyl titanium triisostearate, linum usitatissimum (linseed) seed oil, mica, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, plankton extract, polyamide-5, polysilicone-11, propylene carbonate, rosa canina fruit oil, silica silylate, stearalkonium hectorite, synthetic wax.
